title: Account Suspended for 2 weeks (season end)
body:
I just got suspended for joking around in a ranked game, with 2 non english speaking players. Nice report system riot 

rip rewards

replies.body: why is it not a single person who's been banned can admit they were in the wrong in the forums
where you in the same game as me? They were calling me an aussie dog and trolling 3 other players.
Did ya send a support ticket? Could be worth your while if they were indeed the problem not you.
Oh, I'd like to point out the 2 non English speakers, were duo and they both were shit talking all game.  And they both reported me which resulted in the suspension lol.
I dont agree with them taking season rewards away.
This is the first time iv'e been suspended on this account, and it's right at the end of the season. I hope riot will understand.
Tbh i dont think they will give a shit
Yeah I know, I was about to put $200 rp on this account aswell. Won't be doing it lol

Dont bring that up with riot, I don't suspect they will like the blackmaily feel...
However do send them a ticket. If you where really showing no toxic behaviour you will be fine (2 reports shouldnt result in a suspension)
You should have focused on freeing the House Elves and not messing around in ranked games.
Maybe he needed to prove his league skills to the guardian of clothing
